12c2291f-88e8-4518-b546-5304502d04e1.description: The earner has demonstrated appropriate communication within a professional mentoring experience. They have utilised a variety of language techniques to impart knowledge and information in a multi-modal presentation to a formal audience.
12c2291f-88e8-4518-b546-5304502d04e1.name: Communication

alignments.name: QCAA 21st Century Skills
alignments.description: Young Queenslanders in the 21st century need to be innovators entrepreneurs, lifelong learners, and responsible global citizens. QCAA General syllabuses are underpinned by the skills students need in the 21st century including critical thinking, creative thinking, communication, collaboration and teamwork, personal and social skills and ICT skills.

alignments.name: ACARA General Capabilities
alignments.description: The General Capabilities play a significant role in the Australian Curriculum in equipping young Australians to live and work successfully in the 21st Century. A capability encompasses knowledge, skills, behaviours and dispositions. Students develop capability when they apply knowledge and skills confidently, effectively and appropriately.

badge_template_activities.title: Students within the Future Pathways Program delivered a project presentation through consideration of stakeholders rights and responsibilities, social implications, and a future focus with regard to their chosen profession.

Students developed a professional learning portfolio through establishing a professional relationship with their mentor and maintaining a journal recording communication and key learnings. Over the course of the program students developed an innovative presentation detailing the professional life of the mentor and the evolution of the profession into the future, making connections with the EREA touchstones.

a93a6df0-26dd-43db-8b92-5586b5858eea.description: The earner has manipulated appropriate language, terminology, symbols and diagrams associated with effective and efficient communication. They have transformed language and texts to convey ideas and information about the chosen profession in a concise and engaging way. The earner has imparted knowledge of the profession and professional in a multi-modal presentation to a formal audience.
a93a6df0-26dd-43db-8b92-5586b5858eea.name: Communication Advanced
